<script type="text/x-handlebars-template" class="r7-homepage-instructions-chrome">
    <ul class="list-container">
      <li class="list-item">
        <div class="list-number">1</div>
        <div class="info">
          <p>
            No canto superior direito do seu navegador, clique no botão menu (<img alt="Chrome-menu-icon" class="browser-menu-icon" src="https://assets.r7.com/assets/schumi_core/ticker/browsers/chrome-menu-icon-3ca45250f81904d5656be601452e567b.png" />) e em seguida escolha a opção <b>Configurações</b>.
          </p>
        </div>
      </li>
      <li class="list-item">
        <div class="list-number">2</div>
        <div class="info">
          <p>Na página aberta, em <b>Inicialização</b>, escolha <b>Abrir uma página específica ou um conjunto de páginas</b> e depois <b>Configurar páginas</b>.</p>
        </div>
      </li>
      <li class="list-item">
        <div class="list-number">3</div>
        <div class="info">
          <p>Na janela, digite o endereço do R7 (http://www.r7.com) no campo destacado em <b>Adicionar um nova página</b>. Clique em <b>Ok</b> para finalizar.</p>
        </div>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </script>
<script type="text/x-handlebars-template" class="r7-homepage-instructions-firefox">
    <ul class="list-container">
      <li class="list-item">
        <div class="list-number">1</div>
        <div class="info">
          <p>
            No canto superior direito do seu navegador, clique no botão menu (<img alt="Firefox-menu-icon" class="browser-menu-icon" src="https://assets.r7.com/assets/schumi_core/ticker/browsers/firefox-menu-icon-b0cbadb3570bb7d81cc64ef831baa760.png" />) e em seguida escolha a opção <b>Preferências.</b>
          </p>
        </div>
      </li>
      <li class="list-item">
        <div class="list-number">2</div>
        <div class="info">
          <p>
            Na tela de preferências, em <b>Iniciar</b>, escolha <b>Abrir página inicial</b> no menu <b>Ao iniciar Firefox</b>.
          </p>
        </div>
      </li>
      <li class="list-item">
        <div class="list-number">3</div>

            No campo <b>Página inicial</b>, digite o endereço do R7 (http://www.r7.com). As preferências são salvas automaticamente.
          </p>
        </div>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </script>

</a>
</h6>
<p class="r7lead">
<a href="http://entretenimento.r7.com/hoje-em-dia/videos/-prato-do-dia-dalton-rangel-ensina-a-fazer-panqueca-de-sardinha-ao-pomodoro-a-la-gomes-da-costa-21032017" target="" class="headline droppable" title='Aprenda a fazer panqueca de sardinha ' data-social-headline='Ao pomodoro' data-social-lead='Aprenda a fazer panqueca de sardinha ' data-shorten="http://entretenimento.r7.com/hoje-em-dia/videos/-prato-do-dia-dalton-rangel-ensina-a-fazer-panqueca-de-sardinha-ao-pomodoro-a-la-gomes-da-costa-21032017">
Aprenda a fazer panqueca de sardinha
</a>
</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

    <script>
    var setAdblockerCookie = function(adblocker) {
        var d = new Date();
        d.setTime(d.getTime() + 60 * 60 * 24 * 30 * 1000);
        document.cookie = "__adblocker=" + (adblocker ? "true" : "false") + "; expires=" + d.toUTCString() + "; path=/";
    }
    var script = document.createElement("script");
    script.setAttribute("async", true);
    script.setAttribute("src", "//www.npttech.com/advertising.js");
    script.setAttribute("onerror", "setAdblockerCookie(true);");
    script.setAttribute("onload", "setAdblockerCookie(false);");
    document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(script);
    </script>

<div class="KonaFilter image-container float_right"><div data-post-image class="image"><img src="http://static2.businessinsider.com/image/51e00562eab8ea4162000022-480-/facebook-office-ping-pong-table-2.jpg" border="0" alt="facebook office ping pong table" width="480"><span class="source-only"><span class="source"><span>Glassdoor</span></span></span></div>	<div class="related-links-container minimal ks-see-also" data-bi-heatmap="51daba79eab8eacf25000032">
	    <h3 class="underlined">See Also</h3>
	    <div class=""> 
							<div class="media  first-story">
									<a class="pull-left" href="http://www.businessinsider.com/mass-effect-andromeda-overview-gameplay-story-photos-2017-3"><img class="media-object" src="http://static4.businessinsider.com/image/582494ce46e27a6c5a8b51d5-178-178/the-new-mass-effect-game-is-finally-here--heres-what-you-should-know-before-jumping-in.jpg"></a>
				  					<div class="media-body">
						<h4><a class ="title-link" href="http://www.businessinsider.com/mass-effect-andromeda-overview-gameplay-story-photos-2017-3">The new 'Mass Effect' game is finally here — here's what you should know before jumping in</a></h4>
					</div>
				</div>

				  					<div class="media-body">
						<h4><a class ="title-link" href="http://www.businessinsider.com/eric-schmidt-google-cant-guarantee-ad-safeguards-will-always-work-2017-3">Top executive says there's no way Google can guarantee ads won't appear next to inappropriate content</a></h4>
					</div>
				</div>
							<div class="media  last-story">
									<a class="pull-left" href="http://www.businessinsider.com/waldorf-silicon-valley-school-shuns-technology-2017-3"><img class="media-object" src="http://static5.businessinsider.com/image/58d5679a112f707e0c8b6a9c-178-178/this-silicon-valley-school-shuns-technology--yet-most-of-the-students-are-children-of-tech-execs.jpg"></a>
				  					<div class="media-body">
						<h4><a class ="title-link" href="http://www.businessinsider.com/waldorf-silicon-valley-school-shuns-technology-2017-3">This Silicon Valley school shuns technology — yet most of the students are children of tech execs</a></h4>
					</div>
				</div>
				    </div>
	</div>
<p></div><p><span style="font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.5em;">Google and Facebook are frequently talked about as being great tech companies to work. But are they the best?</span></p>
<p>With help from <a href="http://www.glassdoor.com/">Glassdoor.com</a>, we've put together a list of the 25 tech companies whose own employees rate them most highly.</p>
<p>The reviewers account for culture, lifestyle, and what you can learn while working there. </p>
<p>All the reviews and ratings taken into account are from the past 12 months, and only companies with more than 25 reviews were included. </p>
<p>Facebook took the top spot, knocking down last year's winner, Guidewire, to the number two spot. </p>
<p><em>The report is based on at least 25 company reviews between 6/26/12-6/25/13 and at least 15 company reviews from 6/26/11-6/25/12. CEO approval ratings based on current CEOs with least 20 reviews between 6/26/12-6/25/13. (Company ratings based on a 5-point scale; 1.0=very dissatisfied, 3.0=OK, 5.0=very satisfied.)</em></p>
	    	<h3 class="start-slideshow-label pull-left">
					<a href="http://www.businessinsider.com/top-25-tech-companies-to-work-at-in-2013-2013-7?op=1" start-href="#25-intuit-is-a-well-established-stable-company-that-pays-its-employees-well-1" class="sl-start">
 					Click here to see the best tech companies to work for right now 					&raquo;</a>
  				</h3>		  	
			<!--hidden till we know hashchange has loaded-->
			<div class="slide-intro-bottom">
				<h4>View As:
					<a href="http://www.businessinsider.com/top-25-tech-companies-to-work-at-in-2013-2013-7?op=1" class="sl-start border-right" data-bi-slideshow-onepage>One Page</a>
					<a href="http://www.businessinsider.com/top-25-tech-companies-to-work-at-in-2013-2013-7?op=1" start-href="#25-intuit-is-a-well-established-stable-company-that-pays-its-employees-well-1" class="sl-start">Slides</a>
				</h4>
				<div class="clearfix"></div>
				<div class="clearfix"></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>

                                            <a href="/category/apple">Apple</a>
            
                    </div>
    </div>

		
    </div>

        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-b91196ad-c1bd-4616-89b7-bb55044b7508');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();

                    OFICINA DO G1
                </a></h1></header><section class="gui-card-content meio-highlights card-opiniao-auto-size"><div class=""><div class="content nano-content"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/carros/blog/oficina-do-g1/"

G1 reúne dicas dos maiores classificados</p></div></a></div></div></section></div><script type="text/javascript">
        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-8e1854e6-ac2f-4aa3-9360-743733364a7c');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();
    </script><div data-track-category="cards" data-track-action="videos" class="gui-card card-de-videos " id="card-de-videos-6e340dda-f61c-42f6-9507-201f756236c3"><header class="gui-card-title gui-color-primary-bg"><h3 class="card-de-videos-custom"><a class="gui-text-title"

            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-6e340dda-f61c-42f6-9507-201f756236c3');
                    };

                  media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"
                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    'use strict';

    var timerId ; // Current timer handler
    var refreshTime = 300000; // 1000*60*5
    var graceTimerStep = 10000; // 1000*10

    var isMobile = function() {
        return ($('#regua-navegacao:visible').length > 0);
    };

    var preparePlayer = function(player) {

        var refreshPageWithTimeout = function() {

            console.log('Trying to refresh on' + graceTimerStep + ' ms.');
            setTimeout(function() {
                    if (!player.isPlaying()) {
                        refreshPage();
                    }
                    console.log('Watching a video. Refresh the page later');
                }, graceTimerStep);
        };

        var playerComplete = player.complete;
        if ($.isFunction(playerComplete)) {
            player.complete = function() {
                playerComplete.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPage();
            };
        }
        else {
            player.complete = refreshPage;
        }

        var playerOnPause = player.onPause;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnPause)) {
            player.onPause = function() {
                playerOnPause.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPageWithTimeout(player);
            };
        }
        else {
            player.onPause = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }

        var playerOnStop = player.onStop;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnStop)) {
            player.onStop = function() {
              playerOnStop.apply(this, arguments);
              refreshPageWithTimeout();
          };
        }
        else {
            player.onStop = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }
    };

    var refreshPage = function() {
        if (!isMobile()) {
            console.log('Refreshing now');
            window.location.reload();
        }
        else {
            console.log('Is mobile: Not reloading the page.');
        }
    };

    var checkForVideoPlaying = function() {

        console.log('Timeout: Refreshing the page at any moment.');

        clearTimeout(timerId); // clear timer

        var isVideoPlaying = false;

        $.each(WM.PlayerManager, function(index, player) {
            isVideoPlaying = isVideoPlaying || player.isPlaying();
            if (player.isPlaying()) {
                preparePlayer(player);
            }
        });

        if (!isVideoPlaying) {
            refreshPage();
        }

    };

    var startTimer = function() {
        timerId = setTimeout(checkForVideoPlaying, refreshTime);
    };

    $(document).ready(function() {
        if (!isMobile() && window.location.hash != '#debug' ) {
            console.log('Time Started: ' + refreshTime + ' ms until Refresh.');
            startTimer();
        }
    });

})();
</script></body><!-- Página gerada em 24/03/2017 20:24:31 --></html>

class="feed-post-body-resumo">Catedral, Congresso, Ponte JK ficarão sem iluminação das 20h30 às 21h30.             var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-2264863b-9549-4975-8b86-f6459872d41b');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();

                  media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"
                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    'use strict';

    var timerId ; // Current timer handler
    var refreshTime = 300000; // 1000*60*5
    var graceTimerStep = 10000; // 1000*10

    var isMobile = function() {
        return ($('#regua-navegacao:visible').length > 0);
    };

    var preparePlayer = function(player) {

        var refreshPageWithTimeout = function() {

            console.log('Trying to refresh on' + graceTimerStep + ' ms.');
            setTimeout(function() {
                    if (!player.isPlaying()) {
                        refreshPage();
                    }
                    console.log('Watching a video. Refresh the page later');
                }, graceTimerStep);
        };

        var playerComplete = player.complete;
        if ($.isFunction(playerComplete)) {
            player.complete = function() {
                playerComplete.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPage();
            };
        }
        else {
            player.complete = refreshPage;
        }

        var playerOnPause = player.onPause;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnPause)) {
            player.onPause = function() {
                playerOnPause.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPageWithTimeout(player);
            };
        }
        else {
            player.onPause = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }

        var playerOnStop = player.onStop;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnStop)) {
            player.onStop = function() {
              playerOnStop.apply(this, arguments);
              refreshPageWithTimeout();
          };
        }
        else {
            player.onStop = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }
    };

    var refreshPage = function() {
        if (!isMobile()) {
            console.log('Refreshing now');
            window.location.reload();
        }
        else {
            console.log('Is mobile: Not reloading the page.');
        }
    };

    var checkForVideoPlaying = function() {

        console.log('Timeout: Refreshing the page at any moment.');

        clearTimeout(timerId); // clear timer

        var isVideoPlaying = false;

        $.each(WM.PlayerManager, function(index, player) {
            isVideoPlaying = isVideoPlaying || player.isPlaying();
            if (player.isPlaying()) {
                preparePlayer(player);
            }
        });

        if (!isVideoPlaying) {
            refreshPage();
        }

    };

    var startTimer = function() {
        timerId = setTimeout(checkForVideoPlaying, refreshTime);
    };

    $(document).ready(function() {
        if (!isMobile() && window.location.hash != '#debug' ) {
            console.log('Time Started: ' + refreshTime + ' ms until Refresh.');
            startTimer();
        }
    });

})();
</script></body><!-- Página gerada em 25/03/2017 19:55:31 --></html>
